definition: Qilian Mountains (formerly Richthofen Range), dividing Qinghai and Gansu provinces
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)

sentences.english: The mountains in the south are part of the Qilian mountain range.
sentences.chinese: 南部高山是祁連山脈的組成部分。
